DOC.brief_summary: This open-label, multicenter trial will evaluate the efficacy and safety of treatment with AMN107 in chronic myelogenous leukemia (CML) patients that are resistant and/or intolerant to imatinib mesylate therapy.
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy and Safety of Oral AMN107 in Adults With Chronic Myelogenous Leukemia Resistant and/or Intolerant to Imatinib Mesylate Therapy
